description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              – Assist in Project/Change Request/Support definition, analyzing customer needs; estimate change required effort.
              
              – Assist System Analyst in Design, Documentation, and Develop modules assigned.
              
              – Monitor and test the implementation, and installation of solutions.
              
              – Participate in projects, change/s, and product & technical documentation.May responsible for leading and providing necessary guidance to juniors.
              
              – May responsible for leading and providing necessary guidance to juniors.Ensure solution developed meeting or exceed required standards, quality, and deliver on time.
              
              – Ensure solution developed meeting or exceed required standards, quality, and deliver on time.To conduct Research & Development efforts on emerging Internet Technologies.
              
              – Conduct Research & Development efforts on emerging Internet Technologies.Perform application support role and ensure incidents are resolved within predetermined SLA.
              
              – Perform application support role and ensuring incidents are resolved within predetermined SLA. Work closely with Functional team, peers and business users on system requirement study and issues
              
              – Work closely with Functional team, peers and business users on system requirement study and issues clarification.
              
              – Necessary occasionally to work unconventional hours in order to meet project, change request (CR), and client constraints
              
              – Responsible for taking on additional roles or tasks assigned by management from time to time.
              
              – Deliver task and document all work in accordance with defined standard and processes.
              
              – Ensure that the organization standards and processes are followed and adhered to.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              – Candidates must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology or related disciplines.
              
              – 3+ years experience in software development of Internet/intranet based applications.
              
              – Proficient in the following: .Net framework, C#, Angular JS, JavaScript, VB.Net, ASP.Net, XML Web Services and Microsoft SQL Server 2005
              
              – Experience working on Microsoft SQL and Oracle database on MS IIS, Apache, NGINX
              
              – Experience in MVC, HTML5 and Open source (Node JS, JavaScript, Ionic2 & PHP) will be an added advantage.
              
              –Possess a good understanding of Internet technology, standards, Object Oriented Methodology and n-tier architecture
              
              – Possess excellent problem solving and strong analytical skills.
              
              – Good command of English is essential.
              
              – Able to work with minimum supervision, as well as able to contribute to team development.
              
              – Professional certification is an added advantage.
              
              ******
              
              Benefits
              
              – Working time: Monday – Friday [8.30 am – 5.30 pm]
              
              – Annual leaves holidays will be following Vietnam law and as company regulations.
              
              – Attractive & competitive Salary and 35k lunch allowance/meal.
              
              – Social insurance, health insurance, and unemployment insurance will be under Labor Law.
              
              – UIC Healthcare insurance
              
              – Annual company trips and many fun team-building activities
              
              – Dynamic and youthful working environment
              
              – Professional development opportunities and attractive remuneration.
              
              – Cooperating with many domestic and multi-national partners. Overseas business travel opportunity
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
